page.title: 15HUMBERSIDE RIDING CENTRE
page.content: { {RIDING SCHOOL}The riding school is owned by Mrs Toni Biglin.It is south of the village of Easington between there and the Humber shore.The riding school has 32 horses and ponies,there sizes range from 11hh to 17 hands high.Only 30 of them belong to the riding school because 2 of them Susie and Nimbus are just boarding there. {ACCOMMODATION}The school consists of about 25 stables,a large indoor school and the house in which Mrs Biglin lives. {LESSONS}They have special days for childern.It costs 5 pounds for a day and 3 pounds for an hours lesson.This includes jumping,exersices,rides out and practice in general riding. {FEEDS}The horses are fed on pony nuts,flaked maize,oats,bran,and main ring.They get also get fed on polos.
